questions.question_text: Which statement is true about the single abstract method of the java.util.function.Predicate interface?

choices.D: It accepts an argument and produces a result of any data type.
choices.A: It accepts one argument and returns void.
choices.B: It accepts one argument and returns boolean.
choices.C: It accepts one argument and always produces a result of the same type as the argument.
